overdueAmount.description: The sum of any non-zero charges whose payment due date has passed.

payableAmount.description: The sum of any non-zero charges whose payment due date is imminent.

payableDueDate.description: The date by when the amount is due to be paid. Date in the format YYYY-MM-DD

pendingChargeDueAmount.description: The sum of any charges whose payment is pending (not yet due).

pendingChargeDueDate.description: The date by when the next pending (not yet due) charge must be paid.

totalBalance.description: The total of the payable amount, pending charge due amount and over due amount.

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint
